official_title: Resolution to permit radio, television, and photographic coverage of the swearing-in-ceremony of the Vice President of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes radio, television, and photographic coverage of the swearing-in ceremony of the Vice President of the United States if the ceremony is held in the chamber of the United States Senate.

titles.title: Resolution to permit radio, television, and photographic coverage of the swearing-in-ceremony of the Vice President of the United States.
